channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Opendoor’s stock is rocketing again. What can make it keep going?
item.description: Opendoor shares are skyrocketing again as noted bull Eric Jackson said that the company needs to dive deeper into AI and rethink its business model.

item.title: My aunt barely spends any money. Will we receive the contents of her safe-deposit box when she dies?
item.description: “I am asking for my mom, who is on a fixed income. It would be a nice boon.”

item.title: Palantir’s stock is sliding. Here’s why this short-seller thinks even a $40 price tag is ‘generous.’
item.description: Andrew Left argues that investors have overhyped Palantir stock, and its valuation pales in comparison to a true AI leader like OpenAI.

item.title: My friend’s father gifted her Tesla and Google stock. They could be worth millions. Will they be split 50/50 in her divorce?
item.description: “My friend is working on an exit plan.”

item.title: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?
Bitcoin sinks to $115,000 after hitting its newest record, as macro concerns spark liquidation wave
item.description: The crypto market tumbled to begin the week as heightened macro concerns triggered more than $500 million in long liquidations.

item.title: These stocks offer rising dividends and the prospect of higher returns, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Companies that step up their dividends could provide investors with some buffer against volatility.

item.title: CVS shares are breaking out to the upside after a 3-year bear market cycle, according to the charts
item.description: Chart strategist Katie Stockton breaks down the technical backdrop in CVS.

item.title: Stanley Druckenmiller ramps up health-care stock exposure, gets back into Microsoft
item.description: The legendary investor, who has never had a down year, took a $100 million stake in Microsoft, after exiting the position in the third quarter of 2024...
